Class VirtualPest

java.lang.Object
  VirtualPest
public class VirtualPest
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements the behavior of virtual pests that annoy their owner.

Version:
(PUT DATE HERE)
Author:
Tim Wahls, (YOUR NAME HERE)

Constructor Summary
VirtualPest(java.lang.String nm, int initState)
          initialize Virtual Pest name and state
 
Method Summary
 void doAction(int action)
          change the state of the Pest in response to the specified owner action (and also the random action).
 java.lang.String getAction(int actionNum)
          returns the actionNumth action that can be applied to the Pest (not including random) if actionNum does not correspond to a valid action, this method returns the empty string ""
 java.lang.String getFile()
          returns the file name for the Pest image.
 java.lang.String getName()
          get the name of the Pest
 int getNumActions()
          returns the number of actions that the Pest responds to (NOT including the random action)
 java.lang.String getPestAction()
          return how the Pest acts in its current state if the state is invalid, this method returns the empty string ""
 java.lang.String getPestSound()
          return the sound that the pest makes in its current state if the state is invalid, this method returns the empty string ""
 java.lang.String getState()
          return the current state of the pest (as a String) if the current state is invalid, this method returns "error"
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

VirtualPest

public VirtualPest(java.lang.String nm,
                   int initState)
initialize Virtual Pest name and state

Parameters:
nm - the name of the pest
initState - the initial state of the Pest
Method Detail

doAction

public void doAction(int action)
change the state of the Pest in response to the specified owner action (and also the random action). If the action is not valid, the state of the pet does not change

Parameters:
action - the action that the Pest responds to

getAction

public java.lang.String getAction(int actionNum)
returns the actionNumth action that can be applied to the Pest (not including random) if actionNum does not correspond to a valid action, this method returns the empty string ""

Parameters:
actionNum - the number of the requested action

getFile

public java.lang.String getFile()
returns the file name for the Pest image. The file must be located in the MyPest project directory.

getName

public java.lang.String getName()
get the name of the Pest

getNumActions

public int getNumActions()
returns the number of actions that the Pest responds to (NOT including the random action)

getPestAction

public java.lang.String getPestAction()
return how the Pest acts in its current state if the state is invalid, this method returns the empty string ""

getPestSound

public java.lang.String getPestSound()
return the sound that the pest makes in its current state if the state is invalid, this method returns the empty string ""

getState

public java.lang.String getState()
return the current state of the pest (as a String) if the current state is invalid, this method returns "error"
